textAfterTable: Results 1 - 25 of 87 1 2 3 4 Share | Vacation & Travel Features Pet Friendly Getaways Top 10 Caribbean Destinations Ski Resort Getaways Lake Rental Getaways List Your Property on forGetaway.com Miami Beach Getaway Information Touted as the "Sun and Fun Capital of the World", Miami Beach is one of the best urban beaches in the United States. People-watching is one of the most popular activities in the area, as Miami Beach is known for being a veritable runway of beautiful, well-toned bodies. Night-life in Miami beach is an all-night party, with clubs staying open late
